definitions.definition: The largest city and former capital of Michigan , United States , a major port on the Detroit River , known as the traditional automotive center of the U.S. It is the county seat of Wayne County .

main_definition: The largest city and former capital of Michigan , United States , a major port on the Detroit River , known as the traditional automotive center of the U.S. It is the county seat of Wayne County .
secondary_definitions: ( metonymic ) The United States ' automotive industry .
